answer:
- us_dvd_sales, us_gross, and worldwide_gross are pretty positively correlated, as expected
- on imdb, people are much more likely to give a rating to good movies
- as expected, imdb and rotten tomatoes ratings are positively correlated, pretty linearly
- higher production_budget actually seems to narrow down your imdb_rating to around 7.0
- contemporary fiction is the most popular, and is made into a lot of different genres
- movie releasing happens on an annual cycle, and you can see summer blockbusters
